attributes.action: Permit the telerecording of court hearings at the judges/magistrates discretion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bring forward plans to televise trials and permit the judges to decide what parts it would be wrong to televise as opposed to goverment predetermination in legislation.
Make the recordings available to the media ONLY when all appeals have been exhausted.Let justice be seen to be done!
